descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Nikola Jokic gathers the dime from Monte Morris and drains the floater for the Nuggets.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Monte Morris makes beautiful pass for a basket) 2022/01/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jokic gathers the rock and drains the floater over 3 defenders

videos.description: Will Barton gathers the dime from Nikola Jokic and finishes with the two-handed flush.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Nikola Jokic makes beautiful pass for a basket) 2022/01/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jokic serves up an absolute dime to Will Barton for a Nuggets bucket

videos.description: Austin Rivers pump-fakes and finishes strong at the hole to extend the Nuggets' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Austin Rivers knocks down basket) 2022/01/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Austin Rivers muscles through his defender and drains the bucket
